## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                   | Type                               | Default                               |
| --------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |

| `env`     | --        | Describes runtime environment for the player. | `Object`                           | `{ mode: 'gather', role: 'student' }` |
